about_the_game: In "Akumon Summoner", you proudly step into the world of summoners, the elite of the nation. These exceptional individuals use their powers to protect the people from the dangerous Akumons. You play as Raven, a young summoner who must prove her worth by embarking on a long and eventful journey to the “Junior Summoner Tournament”. Follow her story, support her growth, and maybe even help her become an Elite Summoner.

short_description: "Akumon Summoner" is a captivating RPG where you play as a young Akumon summoner. Catch, train, and mutate your Akumons to build the best team possible. One goal: make your village, your region, and your country proud!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
